room.name: The City Entrance
room.description: You are at the entrance to a small underground city. A great adamantite gate lies open to the west allowing entrance into the city.

direction.general_description: A huge gate opens to the west allowing entrance into the city.
A passageway opens up into a fairly large cave above.

extra_description.description: A large adamantite gate with giant spider shaped emblems stands here.

room.name: A City Street
room.description: You walk along a highly ornate street going north-south. A large gate lies to the east while a building lies to the west.

room.name: A City Street
room.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going north and west.

room.name: A City Street
room.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. A large house stands to the south.

room.name: The 3rd House
room.description: You stand inside the 3rd house of the city; it is fairly well decorated by drow standards having a few statues, murals and such. A door leads to the south.

room.name: The Throne Room
room.description: The throne room of the 3rd house is about as decorated as the inner courtyard except with a blood covered altar in the center of the room.

room.name: A City Street
room.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. To the north is a large building.

room.name: A City Street
room.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading north and east. To the south is an extremely large house.

room.name: The 2nd House
room.description: You stand inside the 2nd house of the city. The room is highly decorated with statues of spiders and murals everywhere.

room.name: The Throne Room
room.description: The throne room of the 2nd house is just a little more decorative than the inner courtyard having an altar in the center of the room.

room.name: The Main Gate
room.description: You are at the entrance to the 1st house of the city. A large gate, almost as big and elegant as the one at the entrance to the city, stands here.

direction.general_description: A large gate lies to the west.

room.name: The 1st House
room.description: You stand in the inner courtyard of the 1st and largest house in the city. The room is extremely large and decorative. Mural and paintings hang on the walls depicting some battles and a spider queen.

room.name: The Throne Room
room.description: The throne room of the 1st house is in one word...awesome. It is so horrifying it is almost beautiful.

room.name: The Main Chamber
room.description: This is the council chamber for the Matron Mother herself. A huge table and chairs surrounding it sits in the center of the room.

room.name: A City Street
room.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading north-south and east.

room.name: A City Street
room.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading south. A building is to the west.

room.name: The Clerics' Academy
room.description: This is the most lavish of the academies being that it is for the clerics.

room.name: A City Street
room.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. To the north is a giant temple.

direction.general_description: The entrance to the temple of Lloth is blocked by large ornamental gates.

room.name: The Warriors' Academy
room.description: This looks more like a barracks than a school.

room.name: The Entrance To The Temple Of Lloth
room.description: The temple is the largest building in the city. Even its doors are beyond imagination. Inside of the temple entrance, the walls are made of gold and adamantite.

room.name: The Mages' Academy
room.description: The Mages' Academy is fairly well decorated and you can see that the drow prefer magic over physical power greatly.

room.name: A City Street
room.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going eastward. To the north is a building.

room.name: The Slave Chamber
room.description: The room is in shambles. Straw is strewn all about the room as beds for the unfortunate creatures who have fallen prey to drow imperialism.

room.name: A City Street
room.description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading west and south. To the north is a relatively small house.

room.name: The 4th House
room.description: You stand inside the 4th house of the city. Its inner courtyard is rather dull by drow standards and rather small as well.

room.name: The Throne Room
room.description: The throne room is basically similar to the inner courtyard in regards to decor. there is a small throne behind the altar but that is about it.

room.name: The Entrance Hall
room.description: You stand in the entrance way to the temple which opens up to the north into a large hallway going east and west. Small statues os spiders line the entrance way's walls.

room.name: A Hallway
room.description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you. To the north is a obsidian stairway.

room.name: A Long Hallway
room.description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

room.name: A Long Hallway
room.description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you. To the north is a door.

room.name: The Warriors' Barracks
room.description: The room is a complete mess. None of the beds are made, clothes and other items have been left all about the room. Well drow warriors never were known for neatness.

room.name: A Long Hallway
room.description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

room.name: The Grand Stairway
room.description: You are standing at the bottom of a giant obsidian and adamantite stairway. The edges are trimmed with gold.

room.name: The Grand Hallway
room.description: You are standing in the middle of a grand hallway. The walls are of the purest adamantite with gold trim. Mosaics line the walls.

room.name: The Mages' Barracks
room.description: The mage's living quarters is rather clean with the exception of a few used component containers. It is rather well decorated as well. Cots line the floor for the mages to sleep on. The only door is to the west.

room.name: The Grand Hallway
room.description: You are walking down a grand hallway, heavily decorated with adamantite and gold. To the north the hall goes down a flight of stairs while a door is to the west.

room.name: The Clerics' Barracks
room.description: The bed chamber is brightly decorated with spider shaped statues, murals and the like. Large beds line the floor making this a comfortable room to live in.

room.name: The Grand Stairway
room.description: You are climbing a set of obsidian stairs surrounded by adamantite walls. To the north are a set of large golden doors.

room.name: The Main Chamber
room.description: This is the south side of a large auditorium used for services by the drow priestesses. In the center is a large sacrificial pit and beyond that is an altar.

room.name: The Eastern Side Of The Main Chamber
room.description: You are on the eastern side of the chamber overlooking the pit. To the east is a door while to the north is an altar.

room.name: The Sacrificial Pit
room.description:
As you climb down into the pit, thousands of spiders cover you, tearing your fragile body to shreds.
Lloth thanks you for your sacrifice.

room.name: The Western Side Of The Main Chamber
room.description: You are on the western side of the main chamber overlooking a sacrificial pit. To the north is an altar.

room.name: The Altar
room.description: You are standing in front of a highly and freshly bloodstained altar. Engraved on the top of the altar is a giant spider with a human head. Looking down from the altar you see a large sacrificial pit with thousands of swarming spiders looking for their next meal!

direction.general_description: Thousands of spiders eye you with undisguised hunger.

room.name: The Slave Cells
room.description: This is the main room to the cell chambers for the slaves to be sacrificed. You notice there are no guards around.

room.name: The Slave Pen
room.description: Rotten meat and breads lie about the floor while shackles hang from the walls. The room reeks of death. You almost become nauseous and decide to leave the room since you were obviously too late to save the slave.

room.name: The Dias
room.description: You stand upon a dias behind the altar. Above you is a enormous illusion of a female drow turning into a giant spider and back again. There is a door to the west.

room.name: The Treasury
room.description: This is obviously only a temporary storage place for the collected treasure being rather bare.

room.name: The Weaponsmaster's Chamber
room.description: This one-person bedchamber is very elegant. The owner must be held in high regard to get this kind of treatment.
